type.desc: Set the data transformation type to stack for calculating stacked data.

orient.desc:
Optional values: 'positive' | 'negative';

Set the direction of the stacking calculation. If the value is negative, the raw data will be processed in reverse order before stacking.

stackField.desc: Set the stacking field, corresponding value should be of numeric type.

dimensionField.desc: Set the dimension field, corresponding value is generally of string type, used to represent the categorical field.

asStack.desc: Set the field to save the stacked data after calculation. If not set, it will be saved by default in the stackField declared field.

asPrevStack.desc: For each categorical value, set the corresponding previous step's stacking value. If not set, it will not be recorded.

asPercent.desc: Set the percentage for each categorical value. If not set, it will not be recorded.

asPercentStack.desc: Set the percentage value after stacking calculation. If not set, it will not be recorded.

asPrevPercentStack.desc: Set the previous step's corresponding stacking percentage value. If not set, it will not be recorded.

asSum.desc: Set the sum for each categorical value. If not set, it will not be recorded.
